title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait SC 460 fact 30
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Cobb Red Portrait SC 460 fact 30
posts.post_content:
looking for better eye appeal then my current version.. if you have one in GD -VGEX condition please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] 
Only interested in PSA or SGC graded cards.

hi Jamie-
ok, for you ONLY would I be willing to relinquish this card.
was discussing with johhny v recently my perceived scarcity of this f/b combo.
personally, I found it to be, by FAR the toughest common red cobb.
would be willing to trade for any of the following (please see my signature):
blank back
broad leaf
drum 
hindu
or, perhaps, a nicer piedmont 350  :D       
hope all is well,
regards,
mark
